com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.lobby

Class LobbyActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.lobby.LobbyActivity

  • public class LobbyActivity
extends Activity
    This activity shows all players who are connected in this lobby and will start the actual game activity when receiving the appropriate command from the game host.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lukas 'mrm1st3r' Taake
